title: Trigun: Badlands Rumble (Trigun - Badlands Rumble)
synopsis: Vash the Stampede is a contradiction. He has a notorious reputation as "The Humanoid Typhoon," laying anything he comes across to waste on the desolate planet of Gunsmoke. However, Vash is in fact very non-confrontational and kind-hearted, living by a code of pacifism.
characters: ['Vash the Stampede', 'Wolfwood, Nicholas D.', 'Thompson, Milly', 'Stryfe, Meryl', 'McFly, Amelia Ann', 'Gallon Getaway, Gasback', 'Kuroneko', 'Flaccano, Cain', "Amelia's Mother", 'Tanto Ogorare, Michio']
